INSTALL.INSTRUCTIONS: It looks like you are installing {{app.name}} for the first time.  Please configure the following variables to tell {{app.name}} how to interact with DHIS2.

ERRORS.CRON: Error!  Could not parse the schedule.  The cron syntax "{{cron}}" is invalid.
ERRORS.GENERIC: Whoops!  An error occurred with code {{code}}.

SCHEDULES.EMPTY_SUBTITLE: Click the "add a new schedule" button to create your first schedule
SCHEDULES.SUBJECT: Email Subject
SCHEDULES.TITLE: Schedules

TOOLTIPS.TRIGGER: Trigger the schedule to run immediately
TOOLTIPS.DELETE:
Delete the schedule. 
Warning! This cannot be undone.

FREQUENCY.PICK_DAY_OF_MONTH: Pick the Day of the Month
FREQUENCY.PICK_DAY_OF_WEEK: Pick the Day of the Week
FREQUENCY.PICK_HOUR: Pick the Hour of the Day
